<!-- header_title: HOW IT WORKS
header_image: ./participate_header.png
header_altImg: participate_header
header_excerpt: Farmers can be compared to Bitcoin Miners because they earn rewards for providing hardware to the networks. The main diﬀerence is that Miners essentially waste their hardware capacity to solve riddles that oﬀer no beneﬁt outside of the Bitcoin ecosystem, Farmers provide capacity in the form of storage, network and compute, that can be used by anyone. -->

headerSolution.subtitle: Join the Most Advanced Edge Network
headerSolution.content: With significant storage and compute capacity already available around the globe, the most advanced P2P network continues to expand.

howItWorks.content:
We aim to empower 1+ Billion people with access to the internet allowing everyone a chance to exchange value, goods and information for less than $1 per month.


Independent of location, race, gender, religion, we leave n one behing so that everyone can deliver services and goods to everyone in all transparency and fairness.


Instead of competing, we collaborate with one another to improve our solutions, efficiency, reach, visibility and our service to the planet and humanity

howItWorks.title: Performance meets Price
howItWorks.content: The team has designed this node with an eye on performance while ensuring an affordable entry point for all. The specs include: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G, 32 GB RAM, 480 GB SSD, and 1 TB HDD.

brandPanel.subtitle: Currently 3Nodes are SOLD OUT
brandPanel.content: Spots are limited. Dive in, and book your pre-register spot in the Q1 2021 Batch.
